trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Macon

Summary: an orange light and a blue light followed me acro
divs: Sighting DetailsThis witness did not provide a written account in this section. He wascontacted by this writer via email and asked to compose a written account andsketch and mail it to MUFONGA.This case will continue if the witness complies in the next few weeks.Tom Sheets, SD MUFONGA
